description:
Located in Greenville, South Carolina, the law firm of Eppes & Plumblee assists individuals, professionals, small businesses and large corporations with their legal matters involving all aspects of criminal, commercial and civil litigation. Serving residents throughout the Greenville metro area as well as those in Spartanburg and Anderson, we offer high-quality representation in the following practice areas:

  • Business and commercial litigation
  • Criminal defense
  • Medical and professional malpractice
  • Arbitration and mediation
  • Personal injury

Led by Greenville natives Frank L. Eppes and Lee Plumblee, our law firm is devoted to our community and has been meeting the legal needs of our local residents since 1997. Today, with a team of dedicated legal professionals and staff, we continue our mission to provide individualized attention tailored to our clients' specific needs and goals. Through this client-centered approach, we are able to better support those who seek our counsel, and we have developed long-lasting relationships with those we have served.

Each of our firm's principal attorneys have been practicing law since the mid-1980s, and both have an extensive amount of knowledge and experience involving a wide range of legal areas. Whether working to resolve a client's issue through arbitration or aggressively advocating on a client's behalf in court, they have the skills and resources necessary to handle any case.

For unmatched legal counsel from an attorney you can trust, you can contact the Eppes & Plumblee law firm to schedule an initial consultation.
